content:
HTA has registred the Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) Level II Code System.

Information can be found here - https://confluence.hl7.org/display/TA/Healthcare+Common+Procedure+Coding+System+%28HCPCS%29+Level+II

HTA asks that if anyone has comments or concerns regarding this information, including the designated URL (whcih will be supported by UTG as preferred), to please comment here or on the HTA confluence page

Note: As part of this work, it was identified that the OID in the existing UTG HCPCS resource is inconsistent with the OID in the HL7 OID Registry. UP-91 (https://jira.hl7.org/browse/UP-91) has been opened in JIRA

@Ted Klein @Julie James @Reuben Daniels

Yes apparently this incorrect OID has been published in the v3 coremif for almost 20 years, and only now when we are examining all this content more closely has it come to light. We will do this first fix asap.
